                <p>
                Founded in December 2019, the interdisciplinary journal club "ReproducibiliTea" is taking place regularly to explore main questions and current topics concerning Open Science and the credibility of research findings. This concept, which originated in Great Britain, has gained widespread recognition and adoption in numerous countries under the same name. 
                
                <h4 class="activities">What we do?</h4>
                <ul class="activities-list">

                    <li> Foster exchange of diverse ideas across participants from all academic levels, fields and institutions</li>
                    <li>In person meetings, and everyone is encouraged to bring their own snacks and drinks.
                </ul>
                </p>

<script>
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
  const list = document.querySelector(".organizer-list");
  const items = Array.from(list.querySelectorAll("li"));

  items.sort((a, b) => {
    const endA = parseInt(a.dataset.end, 10);
    const endB = parseInt(b.dataset.end, 10);

    // Active members first (those ending in 2024)
    if (endA === 2024 && endB !== 2024) return -1;
    if (endB === 2024 && endA !== 2024) return 1;

    // Within active group, sort by start year (earliest first)
    if (endA === 2024 && endB === 2024) {
      return parseInt(a.dataset.start, 10) - parseInt(b.dataset.start, 10);
    }

    // For past members, sort by end year (most recent first)
    return endB - endA;
  });

  // Rebuild list
  list.innerHTML = "";
  items.forEach(item => list.appendChild(item));
});
</script>
